title: Step 1: Your Ethereum Wallet
addressAnnotation: In order to recieve {{ tokenName }} tokens you need to give your Ethereum Wallet Address.
addressWarning: Note: address could not be changed after approval!
kycOnReview: Your data is being reviewed. Please, wait for approval.
kycDenied: Your data was denied. Please, fix and resubmit your data.
passwordMessage: Do NOT forget to save this password! It encrypts your private key. This does not act as a seed to generate your keys. You will need this password + your private key to unlock your wallet.
